name: expenseManager
0:
”Alexa, ask expense manager to add fifty to expenses”
”Alexa, ask expense manager to reset expenses to zero”
”Alexa, ask expense manager to tell me my expenses”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: expense manager
des: It takes arguments of three types: To add expenses, to reset expenses and to know expenses. It will keep track of expenses you have added and tell you how much it is when required.
